nodes.text: Zaviel Tepp was a Jedi of the Jedi Order during the High Republic Era. Tepp was known for being skilled in lightsaber combat. When Padawan Bell Zettifar witnessed Jedi Master Porter Engle destroying mole mines at the Blythe homestead while responding to a Nihil raid, he considered Engle's lightsaber skills to be beyond anything he had seen from Tepp.
Zaviel Tepp was first mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Light of the Jedi.
